documentation.text: @dev A function that allows us to enable gas tokens for use with this contract.
@dev A function that allows us to easily check claim type of the token.
@dev A function that allows us to check the mint type of the token.
@dev A function that allows us to see the total stake of everyone in the protocol.
@dev A function that allows us to see the stake size of a specific staker.
@dev A function that allows us to see how much rewards the vault has available right now.
@dev A function that allows us to see how much rewards a user has claimed
@dev A function that allows us to get a tier threshold
@dev A function that allows us to get the time rewards where enabled
@dev A function that allows us to get the time rewards where enabled
@dev A function that allows us to get the burnToSaveFee
@dev A function that allows us to get the burnToClaimGasTokens

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

unstake().details: A function that allows a user to fully unstake.

totalStaked().details: A function that allows us to see the total stake of everyone in the protocol.

stake(uint256).details: A function that allows a user to stake tokens.  If they have a rewards from a stake already, they must claim this first.

totalRewards().details: A function that allows us to see how much rewards the vault has available right now.

collectReward().details: A function that allows a user to collect the stake reward entitled to them in the situation where the rewards pool does not have enough tokens then the user is given as much as they can be given.

enableRewards().details: A function that enables protocol rewards

claimable(address).details: A function that allows us to easily check claim type of the token.

getBurnToSaveFee().details: A function that allows us to get the burnToSaveFee

getMintingReward().details: A function that allows us to get the burnToClaimGasTokens

getRewardEnabled().details: A function that allows us to get the time rewards where enabled

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

mintingType(address).details: A function that allows us to check the mint type of the token.

getRewardEnableTime().details: A function that allows us to get the time rewards where enabled

getClaimTimes(address).details: A function that allows us to get the claim times

getStakeTimes(address).details: A function that allows us to get the stake times

userStakeSize(address).details: A function that allows us to see the stake size of a specific staker.

totalRewardUser(address).details: A function that allows us to see how much rewards a user has claimed

getBurnToClaimGasTokens().details: A function that allows us to get the burnToClaimGasTokens

getTierThreshold(uint256).details: A function that allows us to get a tier threshold

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateBurnSaveFee(uint256).details: A function that allows us to update the burn gsve:save fee ratio

claimToken(address,uint256).details: A function that allows a user to claim tokens from the pool The user burns 1 GSVE for each token they take. They are limited to one claim action every 6 hours, and can claim up to 5 tokens per claim.

updateBurnClaimFee(uint256).details: A function that allows us to update the burn gsve:claim gastoken ratio

updateTier(uint256,uint256).details: A function that allows us to update the tier threshold

updateMintingReward(uint256).details: A function that allows us to update the burn gsve:claim gastoken ratio

calculateStakeReward(address).details: A function that allows us to calculate the total rewards a user has not claimed yet.

mintGasToken(address,uint256).details: public entry to the convenient minting function

rewardedMinting(address,uint256).details: A function that allows a user to be rewarded tokens by minting or wrapping they pay full fees for this operation.

addGasToken(address,uint256,bool).details: A function that allows us to enable gas tokens for use with this contract.

discountedMinting(address,uint256).details: A function that allows a user to benefit from a lower protocol fee, based on the stake that they have.

burnDiscountedMinting(address,uint256).details: A function that allows a user to burn some GSVE to avoid paying the protocol mint/wrap fee.

transferOwnershipOfSubcontract(address,a.details: A function that allows us to reassign ownership of the contracts that this contract owns.  /* Enabling future smartcontract upgrades without the complexity of proxy/proxy upgrades.
